This Car Scuttle Drain Pipe Water Deflector is designed specifically to improve drainage in Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, and Citroen Relay vehicles. It effectively redirects water away from the scuttle panel, preventing pooling and potential damage.

  • Precise Fitment: Specifically engineered for a seamless fit on Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, and Citroen Relay models, ensuring optimal performance.
  • Water Deflection: Designed to channel water away from the scuttle panel, minimizing pooling and promoting proper drainage.
  • Durable Construction: Made from high-quality materials built to withstand harsh weather conditions and prolonged use.

This product is designed to fit Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, and Citroen Relay vehicles. Its compact design ensures it seamlessly integrates with existing drainage systems.

By effectively redirecting water away from the scuttle panel, this deflector provides several key benefits:

  • Prevents Water Damage: Reduces the risk of rust and corrosion by keeping the scuttle area dry.
  • Protects Electrical Components: Shields sensitive electrical components located near the scuttle panel from water intrusion.
  • Improves Drainage Efficiency: Enhances the overall drainage system, preventing stagnant water build-up.

This Car Scuttle Drain Pipe Water Deflector is a simple and straightforward installation. It typically involves placing the deflector within the existing drainage system near the scuttle panel.

Consult your vehicle's service manual for specific installation instructions and recommendations.
